body.p: 1. Son of Zibeon the Hivite and father of Oholibamah. Oholibamah was one of Esau’s wives (Gn 36:2, 18).
2. Fourth son of Seir the Horite. Anah was a chief among the Horites who also had a daughter named Oholibamah (Gn 36:20, 25; 1 Chr 1:38, 41).
3. Son of Zibeon who found hot springs in the wasteland (Gn 36:24). This Zibeon was a brother to #2 above. See Zibeon.
